articles.title: Colorado Doctor Wears ‘BioButton’ To Track Reaction To COVID Vaccination - CBS Denver
articles.description: The device designed in Colorado measures and transmits data about heart rate, temperature, respiratory rate and a certain degree of movement.
articles.content:
